p: Continuous variables were reported as mean ± standard deviation, categorical variables were summarized as numbers and percentages. Neutralizing antibody titers were reported as geometric mean and confidence interval (CI) of 95%. Comparisons between continuous variables were carried out by two-tailed unpaired t-test; comparisons between categorical variables were carried out by χ 2 test; comparisons of antibody titers were performed in Log-transformed values by two-tailed unpaired t-test and Pearson’s correlation. Statistical significance was determined by a p value of less than 0.05. All analyses were performed using Statistica version 14 (Dell, Round Rock, TX, USA) and Graph-Pad Prism version 8 (GraphPad Software, San Diego, CA, USA).
